userDetails.equipmentAvailability: Have access to a gym and plays soccer

workouts.name: Yoga Flow
workouts.description: A series of dynamic yoga postures linked together with your breath. Focus on sun salutations and standing poses to increase flexibility and strength.

workouts.name: Treadmill Jogging
workouts.description: A steady jog on the treadmill. Maintain a pace that allows you to converse comfortably to ensure you're in the right heart rate zone for fat burning.

workouts.name: Soccer Practice
workouts.description: Join a team practice or work on soccer drills that focus on agility, speed, and coordination. This can include dribbling, shooting, and small-sided games.

workouts.name: Power Yoga
workouts.description: An energetic form of yoga where you fluidly move from one pose to the next while connecting your breathing to your movements. Includes more challenging poses to improve strength and flexibility.

workouts.name: Strength Training - Upper Body
workouts.description: Use gym equipment for a circuit of exercises targeting the chest, back, shoulders, and arms. Include exercises like bench press, lat pulldowns, shoulder press, and bicep curls. Aim for 3 sets of 10-12 reps each.

workouts.name: Steady State Jogging
workouts.description: A longer, steady jog either outdoors or on a treadmill. Focus on maintaining a consistent pace that still allows for comfortable conversation. This helps in improving cardiovascular endurance.

workouts.name: Restorative Yoga
workouts.description: A gentler form of yoga that aims to bring physical and mental relaxation through poses that are held for a longer duration. Use props like yoga blocks and straps to assist in holding poses without strain.

workouts.name: Soccer Match
workouts.description: Participate in a full soccer match or simulate game conditions with friends or teammates. This is not only a great cardiovascular workout but also helps in practicing your soccer skills under simulated match conditions.
